seo.p1: ProfRemont takes on everything related to renovating apartments, cottages and offices in Vladimir — from the first call to the final cleaning. We work turnkey: we’ll visit for free to measure, draw up an estimate, and fix deadlines and price in an official contract. And so you don’t worry about progress, we send photo and video reports every week — even if you’re in another city, everything will be under control.
seo.p2: Need a major renovation? Doing a cosmetic upgrade? Everything included: we demolish and build partitions, do rough and finish works, level walls and pour screed, connect electrics and plumbing, lay tile and floors, install doors and mount ceilings, paint walls and hang wallpaper. We even select and purchase materials — you don’t need to run around stores. Working with a designer? Great. No project? We’ll draw up a technical brief and advise how to save without losing quality.
seo.p3: All expenses are transparent. You get a detailed estimate and a personal account for control. Payment — only upon completion, with all required acts (KS-2/KS-3). We are confident in our services; therefore, we give a warranty up to 24 months. Since 2015 we have assembled a team of vetted craftsmen, set up logistics and clear processes — even in peak season we keep to deadlines.
seo.p4: We also handle organization: we buy, deliver, and remove. We’ll clean up garbage and tidy the site. Work is carried out neatly, especially in occupied dwellings — cleanliness and safety on site are always a priority.
seo.p5: And if you need a reliable contractor in Vladimir who doesn’t waste time and does renovation without surprises — let’s get acquainted. We’ll name indicative cost and timelines in just a couple of minutes. Just write or call.
seo.title: Apartment and cottage renovation in Vladimir — ProfRemont

support.cta.subtitle: Write to us — we’ll help shortly.
support.cta.title: Didn’t find an answer?
support.faq.a1: Usually within one working hour on weekdays.
support.faq.a2: We’ll send an email and a messenger notification.
support.faq.a3: Yes, the form has an attachment field (allowed formats and size are limited).
support.faq.a4: We duplicate key messages to email and can provide a ticket link.
support.faq.a5: Retry in a minute or write in WhatsApp/Telegram from the “Quick actions” block.
support.faq.a6: Yes, we issue an invoice, an act and closing documents upon request.
support.faq.a7: Pilot — from 1–3 days depending on the scenario.
support.faq.deployment.a: On your hosting (incl. hoster.by), VPS or on-prem. We use staging/production, SSH/CI/CD, with safe rollback.
support.faq.deployment.q: Where are solutions deployed — cloud or on-premise?
support.faq.integrations.a: Bitrix24, amoCRM, 1C/UT/KA (via exchange/HTTP services), Google Sheets/Drive, Telegram/WhatsApp bots, e-mail/SMS gateways, REST/GraphQL APIs, Webhooks. If the API is open — we connect.
support.faq.integrations.q: Which systems do you integrate with?
support.faq.ownership.b: By contract, the code and configurations are transferred to you. Data is yours; data export is available.
support.faq.ownership.q: Who owns the code and can we export data?
support.faq.pricing.a: We start with a free diagnosis/brief. Cost is based on effort and integrations; no hidden fees. A limited pilot is possible, payment by stages after acceptance.
support.faq.pricing.q: How is the cost formed and is there a pilot?
support.faq.q1: How quickly do you respond to requests?
support.faq.q2: How to check the ticket status?
support.faq.q4: Where to view the correspondence history?
support.faq.q5: What to do if the form submission fails?
support.faq.q6: Do you work with contracts and invoices?
support.faq.q7: How fast do you connect a solution?
support.faq.security.a: Minimum necessary access rights, TLS/HTTPS, secrets stored in secure vaults, action audit. Forms have validation, honeypot and CSRF. Logs — service only.
support.faq.security.q: How do you ensure data security?
support.faq.sla.a: Weekdays 10:00–19:00 (MSK). P1 — response ≤ 1 h, workaround ≤ 4 h; P2 — response ≤ 4 h, resolution up to 1 business day; P3 — 1–3 days. Channels: email, messenger, phone.
support.faq.sla.q: What is the SLA and response time?
support.faq.timelines.a: Pilot — usually 1–3 business days. Production launch — from 1 to 2 weeks with ready access and defined scope.
support.faq.title: FAQ
